mapper.select: select * from question_lg_category order by length(lg_category_code) asc, lg_category_code asc

select question_lg_category.lg_category_name, question_md_category.md_category_code, question_md_category.md_category_name from question_lg_category join question_md_category on question_lg_category.lg_category_code = question_md_category.lg_category_code order by length(md_category_code) asc, md_category_code asc

select question_md_category.md_category_name, question_sm_category.sm_category_code, question_sm_category.sm_category_name from question_sm_category join question_md_category on question_sm_category.md_category_code = question_md_category.md_category_code order by length(sm_category_code) asc, sm_category_code asc
mapper.insert: insert into question(question_type, question_name, question_img, question_answer, sm_category_code, level_code, member_id) values(#{question_type}, #{question_name}, #{question_img}, #{question_answer}, #{sm_category_code}, #{level_code}, #{member_id});
insert into question_choice(question_num, question_choice_num, question_choice_content) values(#{question_num}, #{question_choice_num}, #{question_choice_content});
mapper.select: select class_name, member_id, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_enable from member

select m.class_name, m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_email, m.member_phone, m.member_enable, mr.role_code,r.role_desc from member m, member_role mr, role r where m.class_name='java 109' and m.member_id=mr.member_id and mr.role_code =r.role_code
select class_name, teacher_name, class_start_date, class_end_date, class_enable from class
mapper.update: UPDATE member m, member_role mr SET m.member_email=#{member_email}, m.member_phone=#{member_phone}, m.class_name=#{class_name}, mr.role_code=#{role_code} where m.member_id=#{member_id} and mr.member_id=#{member_id}
UPDATE member m, member_role mr SET m.class_name='no_class', mr.role_code='ROLE_MEMBER' where m.member_id=#{member_id} and mr.member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.select: select CONVERT(substring(lg_category_code, 2), UNSIGNED) as cate_num from question_lg_category order by cate_num desc limit 1
select CONVERT(substring(md_category_code, 2), UNSIGNED) as cate_num from question_md_category order by cate_num desc limit 1
select CONVERT(substring(sm_category_code, 2), UNSIGNED) as cate_num from question_sm_category order by cate_num desc limit 1
select lg_category_code from question_lg_category where lg_category_name=#{selectLgCat}
select md_category_code from question_md_category where md_category_name=#{selectMdCat}
select lg_category_name from question_lg_category where lg_category_name=#{lgCatAdd}
select md_category_name from question_md_category where md_category_name=#{mdCatAdd}
select sm_category_name from question_sm_category where sm_category_name=#{smCatAdd}
mapper.insert: insert into class(class_name, teacher_name, class_start_date, class_end_date, class_enable) values(#{class_name}, #{teacher_name}, #{class_start_date}, #{class_end_date}, 1);
mapper.select: select class_name from class where class_name = #{class_name}
select * from question_lg_category order by length(lg_category_code) asc, lg_category_code asc
select lg_category_code, md_category_code, md_category_name from question_md_category order by length(md_category_code) asc, md_category_code asc
select md_category_code, sm_category_code, sm_category_name from question_sm_category order by length(sm_category_code) asc, sm_category_code asc
mapper.update: update question_lg_category set lg_category_name = #{lg_category_name} where lg_category_code = #{lg_category_code}
